actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill limiting the use for demonstration purposes of any federally owned property in the District of Columbia, requiring the posting of a bond.

summary.text: Forbids the use for demonstration or camping purposes of any federally owned property in the District of Columbia, where there is reason to believe that damage and expense will be incurred, unless sufficient bond is posted by the applicant for a permit to so use the property.

titles.title: A bill limiting the use for demonstration purposes of any federally owned property in the District of Columbia, requiring the posting of a bond.
